tasks.title: Fix Non-Functional Elements
tasks.description: Address all critical issues related to non-functional buttons, interactive elements, and placeholder content identified in the current state. Ensure core UI components are working as expected.

tasks.title: Complete CSV Import Workflow
tasks.description: Implement the full CSV import process for product data, including validation, error handling, and tracking import history.

tasks.title: Implement Basic HS Code Classification
tasks.description: Develop the core AI-powered HS code classification engine, including automated suggestions with confidence scores and a manual override system for user review.

tasks.title: Build Functional Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Replace placeholder content in analytics tabs with real data display. Implement functional analytics cards and basic interactive charts showing key performance indicators.

tasks.title: Optimize Navigation and Page Structure
tasks.description: Streamline application navigation by consolidating repetitive pages into tabbed interfaces and implementing breadcrumb navigation for clear path indication.

tasks.title: Develop Review Queue System
tasks.description: Build the review queue system to automatically flag low-confidence classifications. Implement the review workflow (approve, reject, modify) and support bulk review actions.

tasks.title: Implement Scenario Modeling and Comparison
tasks.description: Implement the functionality for users to create and compare different classification and duty calculation scenarios side-by-side to analyze potential outcomes.

tasks.title: Integrate FBA Fees and Landed Cost Calculation
tasks.description: Implement the comprehensive landed cost calculator, including integration with Amazon FBA fee calculations and support for multi-country duty rates.

tasks.title: Create Optimization Recommendations
tasks.description: Develop AI-powered suggestions for cost reduction based on classification and duty calculation analysis.

tasks.title: Enhance Analytics and Reporting
tasks.description: Expand the analytics dashboard to include savings analysis, profitability insights, performance metrics, trend analysis, and the ability to export reports in multiple formats.

tasks.title: Refine UI/UX and Frontend Components
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive UI/UX refinements, ensure design system consistency, optimize frontend components for performance, improve state management, form handling, and data fetching.

tasks.title: Optimize Application Performance
tasks.description: Focus on performance optimization across the application, including fast page loading times, efficient API response times, optimized database queries, background jobs for bulk operations, and caching strategies.

tasks.title: Improve Mobile Responsiveness
tasks.description: Ensure the application provides a fully functional and optimized user experience on mobile devices.

tasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Error Handling and Validation
tasks.description: Develop robust error boundaries, user feedback mechanisms, input validation, and data integrity checks throughout the application.

tasks.title: Integrate External APIs
tasks.description: Implement integrations with key external services required for core functionality, including Amazon SP-API, HS Classification services, and Duty Rate APIs.
